topics.body:
News update:
The rebels in Ukraine are falling apart pretty much.  They only clearly control two cities at this point, one of which is right on the border.  The war will probably be over by the end of the year in that the rebels have lost massive ground, half of their forces are about to be cut off and that they will probably on that city on the border pull a last stand.
